titleStmt.title: The saints privilege, or, Gain by dying
titleStmt.author: Scott, Chr. (Christopher), fl. 1655.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 26-27 misnumbered 28-25, p. 30 misnumbered 29.
Imperfect: slightly faded, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
